data.lyric:
[ti:Big, Big Plans]
[ar:Chris Lane]
[al:Big, Big Plans]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Big, Big Plans - Chris Lane
[00:06.88]Lyrics by：Jacob Durrett/Chris Lane/Ernest K Smith
[00:13.77]Just look at her sittin' there
[00:15.45]Sweatpants T-shirt in her comfy chair hmm
[00:20.19]Her hair in a bun one hand on a mug
[00:22.90]And the other one's playin' snare
[00:25.30]To a George Strait vinyl that yes-or-no line'll get her close
[00:29.32]But I don't think she can understand
[00:32.16]Just how far I've been lettin' my heart fall
[00:35.47]But what's in my head
[00:37.11]She don't know I got some big big plans
[00:40.18]Build a little house out on some hand-me-down land
[00:43.34]Find a little Island where we go to get tan
[00:46.55]I bet we take our kids down there one day
[00:50.32]And I know she wouldn't mind if I
[00:52.98]Did a little somethin' like find a flight
[00:56.20]Overnight to paradise and leave tonight
[00:59.20]And I'ma put a diamond on her hand
[01:03.10]She don't know I got some big big plans
[01:06.68]Well she don't know well she don't know
[01:09.41]She don't know I got some big big plans
[01:13.15]Well she don't know well she don't know
[01:16.03]Well she don't know I already bought a ring
[01:20.15]Hid it in the bottom left drawer right beside the sink
[01:23.48]Shiny emerald diamond on a brand-new band
[01:26.22]Asked her mama for permission and her daddy for her hand
[01:29.23]I got some big big plans
[01:31.40]Build a little house out on some hand-me-down land
[01:34.54]Find a little Island where we go to get tan
[01:37.74]I bet we take our kids down there one day
[01:41.48]And I know she wouldn't mind if I
[01:44.14]Did a little somethin' like find a flight
[01:47.38]Overnight to paradise and leave tonight
[01:50.49]And I'ma put a diamond on her hand
[01:54.23]She don't know I got some big big plans
[01:57.83]Well she don't know well she don't know
[02:00.63]She don't know I got some big big plans
[02:04.14]Well she don't know well she don't know
[02:07.47]Well here I go
[02:08.37]'Cause right now we're back in her hometown
[02:11.88]And I'm down on one knee
[02:15.25]I guess she finally figured out
[02:18.19]I'm gonna ask her to marry me
[02:23.74]I got some big big plans
[02:26.05]Build a little house out on some hand-me-down land
[02:28.93]Find a little Island where we go to get tan
[02:32.10]I bet we take our kids down there one day
[02:35.81]And I know she wouldn't mind if I
[02:38.56]Did a little somethin' like find a flight
[02:41.73]Overnight to paradise and leave tonight
[02:44.90]And I'ma put a diamond on her hand
[02:48.62]She don't know I got some big big plans
[02:51.49]Plans
[02:52.32]Well she don't know well she don't know
[02:54.99]She don't know I got some big big plans
[02:58.25]Well she don't know well she don't know
data.trans:
[ti:Big, Big Plans]
[ar:Chris Lane]
[al:Big, Big Plans]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:06.88]//
[00:13.77]看着她坐在那里
[00:15.45]运动裤配T恤 坐在舒服的椅子上
[00:20.19]她的头发盘成一个髻 一只手端着杯子
[00:22.90]另一只手敲打小鼓
[00:25.30]播放着George Strait的黑胶唱片 那一句话会让她仔细聆听
[00:29.32]但我觉得她无法理解
[00:32.16]我的心到底已经沦落到什么程度
[00:35.47]但我心中有想法
[00:37.11]她不知道我有一些宏伟的计划
[00:40.18]在二手土地上建一所小房子
[00:43.34]找一个小岛 我们去那里晒太阳
[00:46.55]我保证有一天会带我们的孩子去那里
[00:50.32]我知道她不怎么在意我做什么
[00:52.98]做点什么疯狂的事 比如搭乘飞机
[00:56.20]连夜前往天堂 今夜就离开
[00:59.20]我会给她戴上钻戒
[01:03.10]她不知道我有一些宏伟的计划
[01:06.68]她不知道 她不知道
[01:09.41]她不知道我有一些宏伟的计划
[01:13.15]她不知道 她不知道
[01:16.03]她不知道 我已经买好了戒指
[01:20.15]藏在左下角的抽屉里 就在水槽旁边
[01:23.48]全新的戒指上镶嵌着一颗闪亮的祖母绿钻石
[01:26.22]问了她的爸爸妈妈 希望他们把她托付给我
[01:29.23]我有宏伟的计划

[02:07.47]我来了
[02:08.37]因为现在 我们回到了她的家乡
[02:11.88]我单膝跪地
[02:15.25]我觉得她终于明白了
[02:18.19]我会向她求婚
